articles.title: Boston College’s collapse is complete with five games to play, and other takeaways
articles.description:
Typically when a team unravels, there are signs a collapse is coming. The inevitable downfall, as agonizing as it may be, can feel more digestible for fans because it was easy to predict ahead of time. Boston College’s football’s sudden demise is an exception.
